OOC: That works for me. I'll assume they retreated as well.
 
The Maxi=
mal shuttle lands outside Mt. St. Hillary.
 
::Lord Elder::
 
Eld=
er: Well at least the Minion presence was detured. Now to find out the stor=
y with this tank Transformers. Weapons ready. Back me up.
 
Elder exit=
s the shuttle, looking to the Ark's tank defender.
 
Elder: Hello ther=
e. I am Lord Elder of The Watchers and currently representing the Maximals.=
 We wish no harm to the Ark or our ancestors...

--- On Wed, 6/4/08, Super =
Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <s=
upercyclonus@...>
Subject: OOC Minions at the ARK!
To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, June 4, 2008, 6:51 PM







> ::Lord Elder=
::
> 
> Elder was about to get worried when the shuttle pilot finally=

> went into action. He had waited untill the last moment to v=
ear 
> away from the missiles.
> 
> Elder quickly spins aroun=
d to the hatch and fires at the 
> missiles as they move out to a s=
afe range of detination.
> 
> Elder: Nice manuver. I'm seeing two Min=
ions still in the area.
> Fire whatever this shuttle has at th=
em.
> 
> Pilot: Two fusion laser turrets, aye!
>
> The shuttle =
swings into the correct fireing positon and releases 
> two laser s=
hots at Nightstrike and Darkfate.
 
OOC: Okay, the above was the last =
post I have for the area around the ark. The minions that were there: =
Deepstryke, Phobia, Decibel and Tumult have all been run off by the arrival=
 of the maximal shuttle and an unknown transformer who looks like a bl=
ack version of Shockblast, but who has no faction identifyer=
. 
 
I am going to begin posting for my folks at the area around =
the Ark probably later this week. However I do not know the actions of Nigh=
tstrike and Darkfate, so I will just assume they left the area, unless some=
one has any objections? 
 
Oh, and don=A2t forget Cyclonus and crew we=
re still in route to Earth, they will be arriving shortly as well. (this we=
ekend, if not before)
 
If anyone has any thoughts or objections or su=
ggestions, please feel free to throw them out here. 
   
FUN=
!!!!!
 
Preston
